SELECT id,nickname,real_name,phone,avatar,spread_count,brokerage_price,spread_uid,promoter_time FROM eb_user where is_logoff = 0 and is_promoter = 1
and create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and ( id like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') or nickname like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') or phone like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') )
and id = #{uid}
and nickname like CONCAT('%',#{nickname},'%')
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
ORDER BY id desc
